title: ‘Explored idea to increase price in premium products’ – Energy Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Minister of Energy Kanchana Wijesekera said that authorities have explored the idea to increase prices in premium products.
In a tweet, the Minister said that 95 Petrol and Super Diesel daily requirements are less than 10% of the market share.
“Driving up prices significantly on both will not be a solution. It will create an artificial demand for lesser priced products,” he tweeted.
‘Explored idea to increase price in premium products’ – Energy Minister
